009package Ch16_Color_Edges;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.RandomHueGenerator;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector;
019import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters;
020import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeTrace;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
024import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
025
026import java.util.List;
027
028import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
029import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
030import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
031
032/**
033 * <p>
034 * This ImageJ plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images. See Sec. 16.3 of [1] for additional
035 * details.
036 * </p>
037 * <p>
038 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
039 * (2022).
040 * </p>
041 *
042 * @author WB
043 * @version 2022/12/12
044 * @see CannyEdgeDetector
045 */
046public class Color_Edges_Canny implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
047
048        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
049        private static boolean ShowEdgeMagnitude = false;
050        private static boolean ShowEdgeOrientation = false;
051        private static boolean ShowBinaryEdgeMap = true;
052        private static boolean ShowColoredEdgeTraces = true;
053        private static boolean ListEdgeTraces = false;
054        
055        private ImagePlus im = null;
056
057        /**
058         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
059         */
060        public Color_Edges_Canny() {
061                if (noCurrentImage()) {
062                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Balloons600);
063                }
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
068                this.im = im;
069                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
074                if (!runDialog()) {
075                        return;
076                }
077                
078                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
079                
080                if (ShowEdgeMagnitude) {
081                        ImageProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
082                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Magnitude sigma=" + params.gSigma, eMag)).show();
083                }
084                
085                if (ShowEdgeOrientation) {
086                        ImageProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
087                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Orientation sigma=" + params.gSigma, eOrt)).show();
088                }
089                
090                if (ShowBinaryEdgeMap) {
091                        ImageProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
092                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Binary Edges sigma=" + params.gSigma, eBin)).show();
093                }
094
095                if (ShowColoredEdgeTraces) {
096                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
097                        ColorProcessor traceIp = new ColorProcessor(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
098                        RandomHueGenerator rcg = new RandomHueGenerator();
099                        for (EdgeTrace trace : edgeTraces) {
100                                traceIp.setColor(rcg.next());
101                                for (Pnt2d p : trace) {
102                                        traceIp.drawPixel(p.getXint(), p.getYint());
103                                }
104                        }
105                        new ImagePlus("Canny Edges Traces sigma=" + params.gSigma, traceIp).show();
106                }
107                
108                if(ListEdgeTraces) {
109                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
110                        IJ.log("number of edge traces: " + edgeTraces.size());
111                        int i = 0;
112                        for (EdgeTrace et : edgeTraces) {
113                                IJ.log(i + ". " + et.toString());
114                                i++;
115                        }
116                }
117        }
118
119        private boolean runDialog() {
120                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
121                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
122                addToDialog(params, gd);
123                gd.addMessage("Plugin parameters:");
124                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", ShowEdgeMagnitude);
125                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", ShowEdgeOrientation);
126                gd.addCheckbox("Show binary edge map", ShowBinaryEdgeMap);
127                gd.addCheckbox("Show colored edge traces", ShowColoredEdgeTraces);
128                gd.addCheckbox("List edge traces", ListEdgeTraces);
129
130                gd.showDialog();
131                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
132                        return false;
133                }       
134
135                getFromDialog(params, gd);
136                if (params.gSigma < 0.5f) params.gSigma = 0.5f;
137                if (params.gSigma > 20) params.gSigma = 20;
138                ShowEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
139                ShowEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
140                ShowBinaryEdgeMap = gd.getNextBoolean();
141                ShowColoredEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
142                ListEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
143                return true;
144        }
145        
146}
